BattleCommandLine - Class in commandline
Command line interface for choosing battles, running battles, and making player moves.

battles - Variable in class game.GameEnvironment
An ArrayList of battles that the player can fight on the current day.
BattleScreen - Class in GUI
Battle screen where player fights chosen opponent.
BattleScreen(GameEnvironment, boolean, int) - Constructor for class GUI.BattleScreen
The constructor for the battle screen, it initializes the relevant variables, and calls initialize to initialize the gui and then calls update to display the gui properly.
battleType - Variable in class GUI.BattleScreen
 
buffAmount - Variable in class game.Item
The damage buff amount of the item, zero if this is not a damage buff item.
buffDuration - Variable in class game.Item
The duration of the damage buff if this is a damage buff item, always 3.
buy() - Method in class GUI.ShopScreen
Attempts to buy the selected item.
buyPurchaseable(Player, int) - Method in class game.Shop
Takes an Player object and the itemIndex that the player wishes to buy and if the player has enough gold, buys the object and adds it to the player's inventory.
